description: Try our easy to follow Berry Cannoli recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cannoli,Pescatarian,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Berry Cannoli Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Thaw shortcrust pastry and cut each sheet into 9 squares. Lightly grease cannelloni pasta tubes. Place a tube across a square of the pastry and roll so that the points overlap. Dab corner with a little beaten egg to seal and press firmly. Repeat with remaining squares.

Heat 2 cups of vegetable oil in a medium saucepan. When hot, cook 3 tubes at a time until golden and crisp (about 30 seconds). Drain on paper towel. When cool enough to handle, twist tubes and gently remove.
Place mixed berries into a small bowl and sprinkle with caster sugar. Leave to thaw.
Empty mascarpone cheese into a small bowl and add sifted icing sugar and beat until thick. Mix thawed berry mixture into mascarpone.
Pipe berry mixture into prepared cannoli shells, sprinkle with icing sugar and serve.
